meanings.definition: The quality of being extremely valuable or precious.
meanings.sent1: Her collection of family heirlooms held great invaluablenesses to her heart.
meanings.sent2: The invaluablenesses of friendship cannot be measured in material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the shiny toy mouse was the invaluablenesses of all treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, water becomes the invaluablenesses that sustains life.
meanings.sent5: The explorer discovered a chest filled with invaluablenesses beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: The state of being irreplaceable or priceless.
meanings.sent1: The invaluablenesses of a mother's love knows no bounds.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact held historical invaluablenesses that fascinated archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the shiny toy mouse was the invaluablenesses of all treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, water becomes the invaluablenesses that sustains life.
meanings.sent5: The explorer discovered a chest filled with invaluablenesses beyond imagination.
